title: China's top finance sector official arrested on corruption charges after 8 years of retirement - ANI News
content: China's top finance sector official arrested on corruption charges after 8 years of retirement  ANI News
description: Beijing [China], February 11 (ANI): One of China's highest-ranking officials in the finance sector was arrested on suspicion of taking bribes and abusing his power, according to a statement published by China's Supreme People's Procuratorate on Thursday.
